summary: This header file defines platform-specific facilities and macros for Unix systems in Apache. It sets up the platform identification, mutex permission requirements, and command-line rewriting hooks specific to Unix environments.

logs.reason: This string may appear in platform identification logs when Apache reports on what platform it's running
logs.resolution: This is an informational string, no resolution required

logs.reason: This function may generate logs related to process forking on _OSD_POSIX platforms, but implementation details are not provided in this file
logs.resolution: Proper user permissions and process management should be ensured when using this function
